Class PlayerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • texasholdem.PlayerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PlayerPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Each PlayerPanel represents 1 player in the poker GUI. Computer players and people get a PlayerPanel.
    Author:
    John Wardell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setCards

        public void setCards(javax.swing.ImageIcon[] cardImages)
        Sets the cards images. Can be an image for no card, a card back, or a card itself.
        Parameters:
        cardImages - the 2 ImageIcons to use for the player's cards.
